name: Soraka
title: the Starchild
lore: A wanderer from the celestial dimensions beyond Mount Targon, Soraka gave up her immortality to protect the mortal races from their own more violent instincts. She endeavors to spread the virtues of compassion and mercy to everyone she meets—even healing those who would wish harm upon her. And, for all Soraka has seen of this world's struggles, she still believes the people of Runeterra have yet to reach their full potential.
blurb: A wanderer from the celestial dimensions beyond Mount Targon, Soraka gave up her immortality to protect the mortal races from their own more violent instincts. She endeavors to spread the virtues of compassion and mercy to everyone she meets—even...
allytips: Soraka is a powerful ally in battle, using her strong healing to keep the party moving forward.
You can use Wish on your allies from across the map to save them from otherwise fatal events.
Equinox can be used as a powerful zoning tool to keep enemies at bay.
enemytips: Focus on attacking Soraka when she ever ventures to the frontline to heal her allies.
Take advantage of Soraka's long cooldown on Equinox if she uses it to harass.
It's easier to focus Soraka than the ally she is healing.

riot_spells.name: Starcall
riot_spells.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Calls down a star from Soraka to a target location. Enemies standing in the explosion radius take {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and are slowed by {{ movespeedslow*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If Starcall hits a champion Soraka gains Rejuvenation for {{ hotduration }} seconds, which restores {{ totalhot }} health over that duration and grants {{ movespeedhaste*100 }}% movement speed decaying over the first {{ movespeedduration }} second(s).

riot_spells.name: Astral Infusion
riot_spells.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Restores {{ totalheal }} health to another champion ally.

If cast while affected by Rejuvenation, Soraka will also grant her target Rejuvenation, healing them for {{ spell.sorakaq:totalhot }} grant them {{ spell.sorakaq:movespeedhaste*100 }}% movement speed decaying over {{ spell.sorakaq:hotduration }} seconds.

Cannot be cast if Soraka is below {{ minimumhealth }} Health (5% of her max health).

riot_spells.name: Equinox
riot_spells.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Creates a zone at target location for {{ rootdelay }} seconds, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemy Champions in the cast radius. Enemy Champions standing in the zone are silenced until they leave.

When the zone disappears, all enemy Champions still standing in the zone are rooted for {{ rootduration }} second(s) and take an additional {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

riot_spells.name: Wish
riot_spells.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
riot_spells.tooltip: Calls upon divine powers to restore <scaleAP>{{ healingcalc }}</scaleAP> Health to all allied Champions. Wish's power is increased by {{ healingampforlowhealthallies*100 }}% on each Champion below 40% Health (<scaleAP>{{ ampedhealing }}</scaleAP>).

riot_passive.name: Salvation
riot_passive.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

i1.name: Salvation
i1.blurb: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Soraka''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|70% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards allied [[champion]]s below {{as|{{sti|health|40% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
i1.notes:
* Similar to {{cai|Feast|Cho'Gath}}, Soraka will be able to recognize champions under the health threshold for the sake of both ''Salvation'' and {{ai|Wish|Soraka}}.
* The movement speed of ''Salvation'' only applies when Soraka is facing in the direction of her low-health ally, even if her line of sight is obstructed by terrain. Merely pathing towards their location will not necessarily grant her the buff.
** A line of arrows points to allied targets, similar to that displayed by {{cai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} or {{cai|Last Breath|Yasuo}}, indicating the direction in which she can gain the bonus movement speed.

q1.name: Starcall
q1.blurb: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Soraka''' calls down a star at the target area, landing after {{pp|type=target range|16|0.25 to 1|50 to 800}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit by 30% for 2 seconds.
q1.description2: Hitting at least one enemy [[champion]] returns the star dust toward '''Soraka''', granting her ''Rejuvenation'' for 5 seconds, {{tip|heal|healing}} her every {{fd|0.5}} seconds and granting her {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, decaying over the duration.
q1.leveling2:
{{st|Total Self-Heal|{{ap|60 to 140}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|15 to 35}}%}}
q1.description3: While '''Soraka''' is '''Rejuvenated''' she can ''Rejuvenate'' other allies with {{ai|Astral Infusion|Soraka}}, granting them the same effects for the same duration.
q1.notes:
* ''Starcall'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target area before it lands.
* ''Starcall'' counts as hitting even if it gets blocked by [[spell shield]]s or {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}} granting ''Rejuvenation''.
* {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block the ''Rejuvenation'' projectile.
* ''Rejuvenation'' heals over 12 ticks, with the first 4 each healing for about 15% of the heal, the next 4 ticks for about {{fd|5.5}}% each, and the last 4 for about {{fd|4.5}}% each.

w1.name: Astral Infusion
w1.blurb: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
w1.description2: ''Astral Infusion'' cannot be self-cast, nor can it be cast if '''Soraka''' is {{as|{{sti|health|below 5% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
w1.notes:
* ''Astral Infusion'' can also be targeted on allied [[Champion summoned units|pets]].
* If Soraka is below 10% of her maximum health, ''Astral Infusion'' will only bring her down to 1 HP, similar to the mechanics of a health resource champion such as {{ci|Mordekaiser}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} will only increase the health donated to allies if the target ally possesses it, although owning it ''will'' boost the heal that Soraka receives from {{ai|Starcall|Soraka}}.

e1.name: Equinox
e1.blurb: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Soraka''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy champions in an area and creates a zone within that {{tip|silence|silences}} enemy champions standing on it.
e1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 170}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|70*2 to 170*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
e1.description2: After {{fd|1.5}} seconds the zone detonates, dealing the same {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy champions within and briefly {{tip|root|rooting}} them.
e1.notes: * The silence is applied once every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

r1.name: Wish
r1.blurb: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Soraka''' calls upon the stars, {{tip|healing}} all allied champions, including {{tip|untargetable}} allies, and herself, which is increased by 50% on targets below {{as|{{sti|health|40% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
r1.notes: * ''Wish'' will not credit Soraka for [[assist]]ing in a kill if the target ally is at full health.
